SELECT count(distinct(ACM.AGENT_NAME, AAL.AGENT_LEVEL_NAME, AALT.NAME, ACM.AGENT_LEVEL_ID)) FROM at_chat_message ACM LEFT JOIN at_agent_level AAL on AAL.AGENT_LEVEL_ID = ACM.AGENT_LEVEL_ID LEFT JOIN AT_AGENT_LEVEL_TYPE AALT ON AAL.AT_AGENT_LEVEL_TYPE_ID = AALT.AT_AGENT_LEVEL_TYPE_ID
ACM.OP_SEND_FLAG = 1
AND LOWER(AAL.AGENT_LEVEL_NAME) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%'
AND LOWER(ACM.AGENT_NAME) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%'

SELECT ACM.AGENT_NAME AS LOGIN_NAME, AAL.AGENT_LEVEL_NAME, AALT.NAME, ACM.AGENT_LEVEL_ID, SUM(ACM.CALL_COUNT) as CALL_COUNT FROM at_chat_message ACM LEFT JOIN AT_AGENT_LEVEL AAL ON AAL.AGENT_LEVEL_ID = ACM.AGENT_LEVEL_ID LEFT JOIN AT_AGENT_LEVEL_TYPE AALT ON AAL.AT_AGENT_LEVEL_TYPE_ID = AALT.AT_AGENT_LEVEL_TYPE_ID
ACM.OP_SEND_FLAG = 1
AND LOWER(AAL.AGENT_LEVEL_NAME) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{agentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%'
AND LOWER(ACM.AGENT_NAME) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{loginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%'
GROUP BY AAL.AGENT_LEVEL_NAME, ACM.AGENT_NAME, ACM.AGENT_LEVEL_ID, AALT.NAME
ORDER BY AAL.AGENT_LEVEL_NAME ASC
ORDER BY AAL.AGENT_LEVEL_NAME DESC
ORDER BY ACM.AGENT_NAME ASC
ORDER BY ACM.AGENT_NAME DESC
ORDER BY AALT.NAME ASC
ORDER BY AALT.NAME DESC
ORDER BY CALL_COUNT ASC
ORDER BY CALL_COUNT DESC
ORDER BY AAL.AGENT_LEVEL_NAME DESC
OFFSET #{offset} LIMIT #{limit}
